title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Critically lauded with an 86 Metacritic score and an 8.6 IMDb rating from over 26,000 votes, this Apple TV series benefits greatly from acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan.

title: Alien: Earth
overview: When the mysterious deep space research vessel USCSS Maginot crash-lands on Earth, Wendy and a ragtag group of tactical soldiers make a fateful discovery that puts them face-to-face with the planet's greatest threat.
reason: This FX/Hulu series demonstrates significant anticipation with over 82,000 IMDb votes, a high 85 Metacritic score, and is helmed by acclaimed creator Noah Hawley within the popular 'Alien' franchise.
